page.title: 18My home in CallowEnd. Delia.
page.content: I live on a smallholding near Callow End. It has no electricity and no running water. We have parafin lamps and a calor gas cooker. We also have a rayburn and an open fire. We have open fires upstairs which you put glowing coals in to heat up the room. In the pantry,we pump water which goes up into the roof to come back down again. We also have a slab to keep things cool. Outside,we hand_milk the goats and cows. Sometimes we make butter from the cream. We also keep bees; we extract their honey and sell it. We have recently had a bathroom put in; before that we used to have an old tin bath.
